TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ComponentConverter extends System.ComponentModel.ReferenceConverter

summary.span: Provides a type converter to convert components to and from various other representations.

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert components to and from various other representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类实现和通过返回的属性通过方法。This class implements and by returning the properties through the method of . 有关类型转换器的详细信息，请参阅基类和[如何： 实现类型转换器](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56)。For more information about type converters, see the base class and [How to: Implement a Type Converter](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/90373a3f-d8c8-492d-841c-945d62393c56). > [!NOTE] > 切勿创建 的实例，You should never create an instance of . 而应调用方法。Instead, call the method of . 有关详细信息，请参阅中的示例基类。For more information, see the examples in the base class. 此转换器转换的对象实现并在属性窗口中显示其属性。This converter converts an object that implements and displays its properties in the Properties window.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, object value, Attribute[] attributes);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptorCollection GetProperties(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, object value, class System.Attribute[] attributes) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetProperties (context As ITypeDescriptorContext, value As Object, attributes As Attribute()) As PropertyDescriptorCollection

public: override System::ComponentModel::PropertyDescriptorCollection ^ GetProperties(System::ComponentModel::ITypeDescriptorContext ^ context, System::Object ^ value, cli::array <Attribute ^> ^ attributes);

param.name: context
param.span: An that provides a format context.

span.span: An that provides a format context.

param.name: value
param.span: An that specifies the type of component to get the properties for.

span.span: An that specifies the type of component to get the properties for.

param.name: attributes
param.span: An array of type that will be used as a filter.

span.span: An array of type that will be used as a filter.

summary.span: Gets a collection of properties for the type of component specified by the value parameter.

span.span: Gets a collection of properties for the type of component specified by the value parameter.

returns.span: A with the properties that are exposed for the component, or if there are no properties.

span.span: A with the properties that are exposed for the component, or if there are no properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 这可以是`null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象上的属性可以返回`null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`. `attributes`数组将用于筛选数组。The `attributes` array will be used to filter the array. `attributes`可以具有多种和对象。The `attributes` can have a mix of and objects. 筛选由以下规则定义：Filtering is defined by the following rules: - A对象将被视为通配符; 它将与匹配的任何属性都具有属性其集中。A object will be treated as a wildcard; it will match any property that has the in its set of attributes. - 如果属性不具有的同一个类，将不属性包括在返回的数组。If a property does not have an of the same class, the property will not be included in the returned array. - 如果属性是实例，该属性必须是完全匹配，或它不包括在返回的数组。If the attribute is an instance of , the property must be an exact match or it will not be included in the returned array. - 如果指定实例和它是默认属性，它将包括在返回的数组即使不没有的任何实例属性中。If a instance is specified and it is the default property, it will be included in the returned array even if there is no instance of the in the property.

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether this object supports properties using the specified context.

span.span: because should be called to find the properties of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `context` 参数可用于提取有关从中调用该转换器的环境的附加信息。The `context` parameter can be used to extract additional information about the environment this converter is being invoked from. 这可以是`null`，因此总是需要检查。This can be `null`, so always check. 同样，上下文对象上的属性可以返回`null`。Also, properties on the context object can return `null`.
